name: Little Pirate Adventure
description:
Little Pirate Adventure is a tiny open world adventure where you can trade goods while avoiding hazards. The objective is to explore, to become rich and find the famous treasure.

This is a last minute attempt for Ludum Dare 47. I only joined Sunday evening and I’m surprised with what I have accomplished in such a short amount of time.

Please rate my game and leave a comment: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/little-pirate-adventure
